name: Hijab Wedding Makeover - Hijab Fashion Style Salon
name_original: Hijab Wedding Makeover - Hijab Fashion Style Salon
description:
hijabsalon games will let you choose from variety of beautifully and distinctly designed hijabfashion.This game is a great choice for anyone who interested in make up of hijabstyle, and this game can even be used as a reference for you to apply real make ups.Live your dream as a hijab fashion designer.
Dress up your model with huge variety of fashion items, mix and match hijabs, clothes, skirts, shoes, and more.Hijab Doll is getting ready to go for party! She always want to look fashionable. Help her to look fabulous!. This game is a great choice for anyone who interested in make up and hijab, and this game can even be used as a reference for you to apply real make ups. This app can also be used as your hijab tutorial.

When you have finished your design, you can also take a photo of your model in 4 different beautiful locations.It's a fun game for kids.Hijab Game for Muslim women make up a character with a variety of Hijab.
Ornamental your character like a princess more beautiful than mermaids.Learn how to wear Hijab Fashion, You will see how Religion and fashion meet. many of picture for


features:

There are mainly 4 levels in game

*Spa View
*Makeup View
*Dressup View
*Photo View


========== HijabSpa-Makeover ==========
- Apply unique and beautiful face packs to make look more beautiful!
- Remove her pimples, extra eye brow hairs, under eye marks, black dots and give her a clean and clear skin!

====== HijabMake up==========
- Change her eye color to make her look more stunning
Help Hijab Doll to look beautiful with unique Hijab and Make-up
- Give her delightful look with beautiful Hijab; you can change the hair color by sliding the color option
- Apply the unique eye mascara with different color options
- Choose a eye brow color from options to make her look better
- Give Hijab Doll more stunning look with unique eye shadows and glow
- Make her cheeks more charming with unique cheek glow options
- Hijab Doll's make up would be incomplete without attractive lipsticks and lip glow


========== HijabDress up ==========
- Accessorize her look with sandals, lots of fun hand bags.
- We have specially created unique outfits to give your Hijab Doll a perfect beautiful and charming look!
- Choose a dress for your Hijab Doll from bunch of options.
- Change the background and give a blissful look!


-Hijab , Jilbab , Scraf , Shawl , Pashmina
- 10 beautiful and unique hijab
- Huge selection of colors for eye contact lenses, lipstick, and eyeshadow and more.
- selectable charming mascara option for eyelashes.
- Different eyebrows to choose from.
- Save your design and share it with your friend.
- Charming mascara option for eyelashes.
- Different eyebrows to choose from.
-4 beautifully rendered background locations.
- Become the best Arab princesse
- Wear different kind of hijab.
- Become a style queen
- Use different kind of make-up products
- Show the world your creativity
- Share your style with friends
- Hijabi Theme.
- Hijab Paris

This game can be used as a Hijab reference hijab tutorial that appear attractive but still syar'i.
